org.apache.arrow.consumers

Class AvroFloatConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.consumers.BaseAvroConsumer<Float4Vector>
      • org.apache.arrow.consumers.AvroFloatConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Consumer<Float4Vector>

    public class AvroFloatConsumer
extends BaseAvroConsumer<Float4Vector>
    Consumer which consume float type values from avro decoder. Write the data to Float4Vector.
